title: Still issues with unicode file names

milestone.title: Release 0.10.0
milestone.description:
The release with new metadata aggregation/search support.

Should include 0.9.2 fixes etc, i.e. have 0.9.x branch merged

body:
#### What steps will reproduce the problem?
```
% datalad --dbg add .
                                                                                                                      Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/bin/datalad", line 8, in <module>
    main()
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/cmdline/main.py", line 347, in main
    ret = cmdlineargs.func(cmdlineargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/interface/base.py", line 427, in call_from_parser
    ret = list(ret)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 382, in generator_func
    result_renderer, result_xfm, _result_filter, **_kwargs):
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 449, in _process_results
    for res in results:
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/distribution/add.py", line 424, in __call__
    **add_kw
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 300, in newfunc
    result = func(self, files_new, *args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 1522, in add
    expect_stderr=True
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 2259, in _run_annex_command_json
    **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 1029, in _run_annex_command
    return self.cmd_call_wrapper.run(cmd_list, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/cmd.py", line 588, in run
    cmd, env=self.get_git_environ_adjusted(env), *args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/cmd.py", line 428, in run
    expect_fail=expect_fail)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/cmd.py", line 245, in _get_output_online
    line = log_stdout_(line.decode())
UnicodeDecodeError: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xef in position 139: ordinal not in range(128)
()
> /home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/cmd.py(245)_get_output_online()
-> line = log_stdout_(line.decode())
(Pdb) line
'{"command":"add","success":true,"key":"MD5E-s19398299--8216274e520a345ac0fd51eed8564e99.pdf","file":"REDACTED_RELEVANTPART:Zo\xef\xbf\xbd\xef\xbf\xbd..."}\n'
```
